Fix test client [call]back returning (#732)

If you preinitialize all the test clients, you won't get the server
acknowledgements because only last initialized test client's
monkeypatched successfully _send_packet, with self in its closure. So
when other test client instances check self.ack is None when
callback=True in emit(), it doesn't contain the ack meant for them.
undoing fix for #713 as it breaks the reloader for regular apps

Merge pull request #447 from zhengxiaoyao0716/patch-1

Fix 'path' or 'resource' doesn't work.

Fix 'path' or 'resource' doesn't work.

In this case, it works well:
> socketio = SockeIO(app, path='/path/socket.io')
While this case, it doesn't worked before the change:
> socketio = SockeIO(path='/path/socket.io')
> socketio.init_app(app)
So that this change can fix it.

Merge pull request #341 from wgwz/improve-doc-protocol

Improve socketio connect function for http[s]

Improve socketio connect function for http[s]

Previously just the http protocol was used.
The `io.connect` function now uses `location.protocol`.
This generalizes so that the socket connection can be
made for both http and https.

Merge pull request #225 from Grant1219/master

Allow for debugging when other WSGI middleware is inserted after SocketIO middleware

Added reference of _SocketIOMiddleware instance to the SocketIO class

This allows DebugMiddleware to be easily inserted and resolves the
issue of finding the _SocketIOMiddleware when it is not at the head
of the WSGI middleware chain.

Related issue: https://github.com/miguelgrinberg/Flask-SocketIO/issues/224

Merge pull request #174 from jwg4/master

Replace assertTrue with assertEqual where possible.

Replace assertTrue with assertEqual where possible.

This means that the failure messages will be more useful - assertTrue(1 == 2) gives a message 'False is not true', whereas assertEqual(1, 2) gives the message '2 != 1'
